rooms.description: Entry hall that leads to a spacious living area. Designed with Vastu principles to attract positive energy by aligning the main entrance in the south-east direction.
Open-plan living area with natural light from large windows on the east and north walls. Incorporates Vastu recommendations for social interaction.
Adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring efficient workflow and connectivity. Positioned according to local norms for dining spaces.
Modern modular kitchen with sufficient space for appliances and storage. Features an integrated island counter while keeping Vastu principles in mind by aligning the stove position.
Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony that overlooks the garden. Designed for privacy and tranquility with Vastu orientation toward north-west direction.
Additional bedroom suited for joint family use; includes a balcony as per the requirement. Placed to ensure balanced energy flow and natural lighting.
Another bedroom for the joint family arrangement with dedicated balcony space. Aligning Vastu principles by placing windows on auspicious directions.
Fourth bedroom designed as a bachelor pad suite with modern aesthetics and personal amenities including a balcony. Ensuring proper Vastu orientation for growth and prosperity.
